column2: an A.M. Eatery////I read all the reviews about the place being "worth" long waits
column4: and "worth" total lack of wait space. No
column5: no it is not. After no parking being available nearby
column6: I parked in a spot I worried about being towed or booted
column7: walked in the cold rain for a block or so
column8: and then was "sardined" into a very tiny waiting area. I stood uncomfortably for 48 minutes after being told by the hostess (who was constantly snacking)
column9: that the wait should be around 25-30 minutes.
